wikipedia_page.main: Jonny Hill (born 8 June 1994) is an English professional rugby union player who plays at lock for Premiership club Exeter Chiefs. Hill is the nephew of former Rugby league international Paul Loughlin.

response: Rugby player Jonny Hill who made his debut for England against Italy in the Six Nations Championship in 2020 hails from Stanton Lacy and went to school in Ludlow.
